channel.title: Cli on My reflections
channel.description: Recent content in Cli on My reflections

item.title: Very simple Git workflow
item.description: Simple git workflow Open command prompt and go to your local copy of your repository. dos cd C:\Workplace\DevOps\reponame\ Create new branch. dos git checkout -b user/avinash-addNewPackage Make your changes to the local copy of repository. Stage your changes dos git add * Commit your changes. dos git commit -m "Adding new package" Push your changes to remote branch. dos git push origin user/avinash-addNewPackage Go to Azure DevOps and create a pull request to merge your work with master branch.
